Class RDFPoolTransformerFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.oucs.gaboto.entities.transformation.RDFPoolTransformerFactory

public class RDFPoolTransformerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory to create EntityPoolTransformers that transform entity pools into various RDF formats.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Arno Mittelbach

Method Detail

getRDFPoolTransformer

public static EntityPoolTransformer getRDFPoolTransformer(java.lang.String format)
                                                   throws UnsupportedFormatException
Creates a new transformer object for the specified format.

Can create transformer objects for any RDF format. See GabotoQuery for a description of all supported RDF formats.

Parameters:
format - The RDF format
Returns:
A transformer object that transforms an entity pool into RDF.
Throws:
UnsupportedFormatException
